name: Medarot Brave
summary:
Action RPG for Nintendo GameCube. The graphic is a full 3D polygon.

There are a lot of bugs in the game (Freeze, stop the game, etc.), and the parts are hard to complete without support for a memory card fix. Very rarely, a bug can be completely cleared (This game is a game that cannot be cleared completely, and it is a bug that it can be cleared completely).

Rare parts can be obtained by linking with "Medarot navi", "Medarot G" and "Medarot 2 CORE" by the GBA link function as a fun element after complete clearing.
